A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a single work\, The Last Jedi is the greatest in the franchise since The Empire Strikes back. It sports some of the most daring storytelling seen in the franchise in years\, and it has fun while it's doing it. Like all second chapters\, it will be good to eventually view this film through the lens of a completed trilogy and judge it as a whole. Until then\, The Last Jedi is great!
